# mcp-gitlab

> MCP server for the GitLab REST API providing 76 tools, 6 resources, and 5 prompts for AI assistants to manage projects, merge requests, pipelines, CI/CD variables, approvals, issues, code reviews, and more.

mcp-gitlab is a [Model Context Protocol (MCP)](https://modelcontextprotocol.io/) server that wraps the GitLab REST API. It works with GitLab.com and self-hosted GitLab instances (CE/EE). No GitLab Duo or Premium required.

- **Install**: `uvx mcp-gitlab`
- **Python**: >=3.10
- **License**: MIT
- **Version**: 0.6.9
- **Transport**: stdio (default), SSE, streamable-http
- **Required env vars**: `GITLAB_URL` (instance URL), `GITLAB_TOKEN` (personal access token with `api` scope)
- **Optional env vars**: `GITLAB_READ_ONLY` (disable writes), `GITLAB_TIMEOUT` (request timeout), `GITLAB_SSL_VERIFY` (SSL verification)

## Documentation

- [README](https://github.com/vish288/mcp-gitlab#readme): Full setup, configuration, tool reference, usage examples, security considerations
- [PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/mcp-gitlab/): Package page with installation options
- [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/vish288/mcp-gitlab): Source code, issues, development setup
- [MCP Registry](https://registry.modelcontextprotocol.io): MCP server discovery

## Optional

- [Changelog](https://github.com/vish288/mcp-gitlab/releases): Release history and version notes
- [MCP Specification](https://modelcontextprotocol.io/docs): Model Context Protocol documentation
- [FastMCP](https://github.com/jlowin/fastmcp): Framework used to build this server
